#id=1
#text=Yesterday I did my weekly grocery shopping .
#id=2
#text=I began the day by checking my cupboards and refrigerator to see what we were out of or running low on .
#id=3
#text=As I came across items I needed , I wrote them down on a piece of paper , which I planned to take with me to the store .
#id=4
#text=That way , I would n't have to rely on my memory and forget anything .
#id=5
#text=I gathered together my cloth grocery bags and put them in the car , then drove to the store .
#id=6
#text=Before heading in , I got a grocery cart from outside the store , and took out my shopping list .
#id=7
#text=As I went up and down the aisles , I crossed off items on my grocery list as I placed the items in the cart .
#id=8
#text=When all the items on my list were in the cart , I wheeled the cart to the check-out line .
#id=9
#text=I had to wait in line since there were some people ahead of me .
#text=When it was my turn , I took the items out of my cart and placed them on the conveyor belt that brought them up to the cashier .
#text=She took each item and swiped its bar code over a screen that gave her the price .
#text=When all the items had been checked out , she told me what the total would be .
#text=I paid for the groceries , and then wheeled my cart over to an area where I could place the groceries into my reusable bags .
#text=Once that was done , I pushed the cart through the parking lot to my car , where I loaded the bags of groceries into my car , and drove home .
#text=When I got home , I took the bags into the house and removed all the items from them .
#text=Putting the groceries away in the cupboards and refrigerator was the final step of grocery shopping day .
